sn35.97:4.4: Cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ byāsiñcati.
sn35.97:4.5: Cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu tassa byāsittacittassa pāmojjaṃ na hoti.
sn35.97:4.11: Dhammānaṃ apātubhāvā pamādavihārītveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati … pe …
sn35.97:4.12: jivhindriyaṃ asaṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ byāsiñcati jivhāviññeyyesu rasesu, tassa byāsittacittassa … pe …
sn35.97:4.14: manindriyaṃ asaṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ byāsiñcati manoviññeyyesu dhammesu, tassa byāsittacittassa pāmojjaṃ na hoti.
sn35.97:5.2: Cakkhundriyaṃ saṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ na byāsiñcati cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu, tassa abyāsittacittassa pāmojjaṃ jāyati.
sn35.97:5.8: Dhammānaṃ pātubhāvā appamādavihārītveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati … pe …
sn35.97:5.9: jivhindriyaṃ saṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ na byāsiñcati … pe …
sn35.97:5.11: Manindriyaṃ saṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ na byāsiñcati, manoviññeyyesu dhammesu, tassa abyāsittacittassa pāmojjaṃ jāyati.
